alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 12:39AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lonoke, eastern Saline and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1238 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ironton, or near Southwest Little Rock, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Burns Park... Ironton... Protho Junction... Sweet Home... Lakewood... Camp Robinson... Geyer Springs... Sylvan Hills... Mabelvale... Levy... McAlmont... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 131 and 142. Interstate 40 between mile markers 149 and 161. Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 10. Interstate 630 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 440 between mile markers 1 and 12. US Highway 67 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
